title: Market Entry Strategy Case
description: Analyzed market size, competition, and consumer behavior to recommend an entry strategy for a local FMCG brand, including positioning and channel strategy.

title: Survey-based Consumer Insight
description: Designed and conducted a student survey, cleaned data, and presented insights on purchase drivers and satisfaction with visual summaries.

title: Brand Positioning Presentation
description: Prepared a presentation on repositioning for a local brand using perceptual mapping and communication strategy.
